Translations.Text: Vony skazaly, "Vyklyk na vashoho Lorda pokazaty nam kotryy. heifers pohlyad skhozhyy do nas ta, BOH bazhayuchi, my budemo keruvatysya

Vin skazav, "Vin kazhe shcho vona ye heifer shcho nikoly ne bula prynyzhena u plowing zemlya abo polyvayuchi zerno; vyzvolitʹ z budʹ-yakoyi plyamy." Vony skazaly, "Zaraz vy prynesly pravdu." Vony nareshti pozhertvuvaly yi, pislya tse lengthy reluctance
Vy ubyly dushu, todi posperechalysya sered sebe. BOH musytʹ expose shcho vy postaralysya prykhovaty
My skazaly, "Udar (zhertva) z chastynoyu (heifer)."Tse - koly BOH prynis zhertvu nazad do zhyttya, ta pokazav vam Yoho znaky, shcho vy mozhete zrozumity

Nezvazhayuchy na tse, vashi zatverdili serdenʹka lyublyatʹ skeli, abo navitʹ bilʹsh tyazhki. Dlya ye skeli z kotrykh richky zlyva. Inshi triskayutʹsya ta vypuskayutʹ nizhni potoky, ta inshi skeli cringe z povahy dlya BOHA. BOH nikoly unaware budʹ shcho vy
vy ochikuyete yikh poviryty tomu shcho vy, koly deyakyy z nykh zvychayno chuly slovo BOHA, todi vykryvlyayete tse, z povnym rozuminnyam tut, ta navmysne

Ta koly vony zustrichayutʹ viruyuchiv, yak kazhutʹ, "My vvazhayemo, "ale koly vony pryyizhdzhayutʹ razom z odyn odnoho, yak kazhutʹ, "Ne informuyutʹ (viruyuchi) informatsiyi danoyi vam BOHOM, lest vy zabezpechuyete yikh z pidtrymkoyu dlya yikhnʹoho arhumentu shchodo vashoho Lorda. Vy ne rozumiyete
